name: Microsoft Azure AD
description:
Fetches users and their respective scores from Microsoft Azure AD platform and also performs actions on them. 

 URE score calculation => RiskLevel None: N/A, RiskLevel hidden: N/A, RiskLevel unknownFutureValue: N/A, RiskLevel low: 875, RiskLevel medium: 625, RiskLevel high: 375.

configuration.label: Client (Application) ID
configuration.description: Application ID for Microsoft Azure AD.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Secret value of your Client (Application) ID for Microsoft Azure AD.

configuration.label: Tenant ID
configuration.description: Tenant ID of your Microsoft account.
